member.name: T:Penguin.Web.Data.MimeMappings
member.summary: A static class used for mapping common file extensions to MimeTypes

member.name: M:Penguin.Web.Data.MimeMappings.GetMimeType(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the string mime type for a given file extension
member.returns: The string mime type for the file extension

member.name: M:Penguin.Web.Data.MimeMappings.GetType(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the top level mime type for a given file name (based on extension)
member.param: The file name to check the mime type of
member.returns: The top level mime type for a given file name (based on extension)
